mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD=5 AND TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS askCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD=2 AND TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS adopterCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE TO_CHAR(PAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS fundingCount FROM DUAL
SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월"') AS MONTH, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD=2 AND CATEGORY='완료' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월"')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT, TO_CHAR(PAY_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월"') AS MONTH FROM PAYMENT GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PAY_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월"')
